sentences.en: A wage freeze was imposed on all staff earlier this month.
sentences.cn: 这个月早些时候，所有员工的工资都被冻结了。

sentences.en: Activists stepped up their demands for local autonomy last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月激进分子对地方自治的呼声更高了。

sentences.en: After a further four-month extension of her probation period, she was sacked.
sentences.cn: 在又试用了4个月后，她被开除了。

sentences.en: Ballpark estimates indicate a price tag of $90 million a month.
sentences.cn: 大致的估计费用为每月9,000万美元。

sentences.en: Duke was soundly defeated in this month's Louisiana governor's race.
sentences.cn: 杜克在本月的路易斯安那州长竞选中大败而归。

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

sentences.en: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
sentences.cn: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

sentences.en: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month .
sentences.cn: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.en: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.en: It will take you a month of Sundays to chop all that wood.
sentences.cn: 你得花费很长时间才能劈完所有的柴

sentences.en: no one will find them in a month of Sundays.
sentences.cn: 在很长时间里，没人会发现他们。

sentences.en: Sales rose by nought point four per cent last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月销售额上升了0.4％。

sentences.en: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.cn: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

sentences.en: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ) .
sentences.cn: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.en: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ).
sentences.cn: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.en: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
sentences.cn: 每月4,000万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

sentences.en: The change proposed last month was foreshadowed in the March Budget.
sentences.cn: 上个月提议的变动在3月份的预算中已经有所预兆了。

sentences.en: The ship will not be ready for a month.
sentences.cn: 船1个月内还不能交付使用。

sentences.en: The three month time limit will be up in mid-June.
sentences.cn: 3个月的限期截至6月中旬。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.cn: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

words.tran_cn: 每月的，每月一次的；有效期为一个月的

phrases.tran_cn: 一段很长但不确定的时间

trans.tran_en: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into
